text: Jade is an American hip hop-soul group. The group began in 1991. They split in 1997 and reformed in 2014. The group's members are Joi Marshall, Tonya Kelly and Myracle Holloway. The group is from Chicago. The group had hit songs with "I Wanna Love You Down" and "Don't Walk Away" in 1992 and 1993. Their second album, Mind, Body & Song, was released in 1994. ==References== Category:1991 establishments in Illinois Category:1990s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American R&B; bands Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:Musical groups from Chicago Category:Musical trios
title: Jade (American band)
